text:
When [redacted_name] had woken up, he had been warm and dry, and his old friend [redacted_name] was sitting across from him watching TV.
With the help of Zoro and [redacted_name], Law had been cleaned and bandaged. He was confused and frightened, but seeing Zoro again had been like seeing a glimpse of a life he had actually enjoyed. Zoro never left his side for the next four days; even when Law was screaming in pain and vomiting so violently his sides felt they were going to split apart.
trans:
[편집됨_이름]이 일어났을 때, 그는 따뜻하고 건조했으며, 오랜 친구인 [편집됨_이름]이 그의 맞은 편에서 TV를 보고 있었다.
조로와 [편집됨_이름]의 도움으로, 로는 깨끗해지고 붕대를 감고 있었다. 그는 혼란스럽고 두려웠지만, 조로를 다시 보는 것은 자신이 진정 즐겼던 삶의 일부를 보는 것 같았다. 조로는 이후 나흘 동안 그의 곁을 지켰다; 로가 고통스러워 비명을 지르거나 양쪽이 찢어질 정도로 격렬하게 토를 할 때조차 말이다.
